elements.name: Functional Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying a group of application related transaction sets

elements.name: Group Control Number
elements.notes: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

segments.name: Transaction Set Header
segments.notes: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

elements.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
elements.notes: Code identifying a Transaction Set

elements.name: Transaction Set Control Number
elements.notes: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segments.name: Data Segment Note
segments.notes: To report errors in a data segment and identify the location of the data segment

elements.name: Segment ID Code
elements.notes: Code defining the segment ID of the data segment in error (See Appendix A - Number 77)

elements.name: Segment Position in Transaction Set
elements.notes: The numerical count position of this data segment from the start of the transaction set: the transaction set header is count position 1

elements.name: Loop Identifier Code
elements.notes: The loop ID number given on the transaction set diagram is the value for this data element in segments LS and LE

elements.name: Segment Syntax Error Code

data_type_ids.6: Segment Not in Defined Transaction Set

elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a segment

segments.name: Data Element Note
segments.notes: To report errors in a data element or composite data structure and identify the location of the data element

elements.name: Position in Segment
elements.notes: Code indicating the relative position of the simple data element or composite data structure in error within a segment, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the segment ID; additionally indicating the relative position of a repeating structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position immediately following the preceding element separator; additionally indicating the relative position of a component of a composite data structure in error, count beginning with 1 for the position following the preceding element or repetition separator

elements.name: Element Position in Segment
elements.notes: This is used to indicate the relative position of a simple data element, or the relative position of a composite data structure with the relative position of the component within the composite data structure, in error; in the data segment the count starts with 1 for the simple data element or composite data structure immediately following the segment ID

elements.name: Component Data Element Position in Composite
elements.notes: This is used to indicate the relative position of a simple data element, or the relative position of a composite data structure with the relative position of the component within the composite data structure, in error; in the data segment the count starts with 1 for the simple data element or composite data structure immediately following the segment ID

elements.name: Repeating Data Element Position
elements.notes: To identify the specific repetition of a data element that is in error

elements.name: Data Element Reference Number
elements.notes: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

elements.name: Data Element Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating the error found after syntax edits of a data element

elements.name: Copy of Bad Data Element
elements.notes: This is a copy of the data element in error

segments.name: Transaction Set Response Trailer
segments.notes: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection and report errors in a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Acknowledgment Code

data_type_ids.X: Rejected, Content After Decryption Could Not Be Analyzed

elements.notes: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

elements.name: Transaction Set Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of a transaction set

name: Functional Group Response Trailer
notes: To acknowledge acceptance or rejection of a functional group and report the number of included transaction sets from the original trailer, the accepted sets, and the received sets in this functional group

elements.name: Functional Group Acknowledge Code

data_type_ids.P: Partially Accepted, At Least One Transaction Set Was Rejected
data_type_ids.X: Rejected, Content After Decryption Could Not Be Analyzed

elements.notes: Code indicating accept or reject condition based on the syntax editing of the functional group

elements.name: Number of Transaction Sets Included
elements.notes: Total number of transaction sets included in the functional group or interchange (transmission) group terminated by the trailer containing this data element

elements.name: Number of Received Transaction Sets
elements.notes: Number of Transaction Sets received

elements.name: Number of Accepted Transaction Sets
elements.notes: Number of accepted Transaction Sets in a Functional Group

elements.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

elements.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

elements.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

elements.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer

elements.name: Functional Group Syntax Error Code
elements.notes: Code indicating error found based on the syntax editing of the functional group header and/or trailer
